addr: 150 W 83rd St, 5th floor New York, NY 10024
title: City Lab: The Personal Life of the Leader
desc: New York City poses unique challenges for ministry leaders. The needs of our congregations are endless, but to be fruitful we must nourish our own personal and spiritual lives. In this series we will address topics such as prayer, personal and cultural idols, marriage and friendship, failure, and wisdom. Join leaders from across the five boroughs for talks by Tim Keller, guest speakers, and workshops to work out these ideas in your life and ministry. DATES: September 24, 2015: The Resurrection Life November 5, 2015: Unique Temptations of Ministry Leaders January 7, 2016:?Resiliency in Ministry March 3, 2016: Marriage & Friendship May 12, 2016: Wisdom  & ?Failure TIME: ? Thursday afternoons, 2-5pm Part 1: Talk and Q&A with Tim Keller, Case Study of a Practitioner Part 2: Workshop at round tables, facilitated by Redeemer City to City staff PLACE: Redeemer West 83rd Ministry Center, 5th FL 150 West 83rd Street between Amsterdam & Columbus PRICE*: $50 per individual (includes all 5 sessions) $125 per church group (includes all 5 sessions for up to 5 individuals) Please enter each person's name and email address so they can receive event reminders and surveys. *Scholarships available.
